labels.analysis: The MCP Server is focused on providing real-time cryptocurrency market data and analysis functionalities. Its core tools enable users to query current prices, market trends, detailed coin information, and sophisticated trading data such as contract positions, trading volumes, and K-line charts through Coinglass API. The server serves as a comprehensive gateway to cryptocurrency market insights, particularly aimed at traders and investors needing up-to-date and in-depth market intelligence.
labels.reasoning: The primary label of "Cryptocurrency & Blockchain" is chosen because the server's tools are specifically tailored for cryptocurrency market analysis, which falls under this broad category. The secondary label of "Data Analysis & Processing" is appropriate because it involves trending analysis, data aggregation, and visualization of trading metrics. The custom label "Crypto Market Analytics" further highlights its specialized focus on detailed cryptocurrency market insights beyond basic price checks.

tools.name: get_coin_price
tools.description:
获取指定虚拟币的当前价格

    Args:
        coin_id: 虚拟币的ID (例如 bitcoin, ethereum, dogecoin)
        currency: 货币单位 (默认为人民币cny, 也可以是usd等)

    Returns:
        包含价格信息的字符串

tools.name: get_trending_coins
tools.description:
获取当前热门虚拟币列表

    Returns:
        包含热门虚拟币信息的字符串

tools.name: get_coin_detail
tools.description:
获取虚拟币的详细信息

    Args:
        coin_id: 虚拟币的ID (例如 bitcoin, ethereum)

    Returns:
        包含详细信息的字符串

tools.name: get_global_market_data
tools.description:
获取全球加密货币市场数据

    Returns:
        包含市场数据的字符串

tools.name: search_coins
tools.description:
搜索虚拟币

    Args:
        query: 搜索关键词
        limit: 返回结果数量上限, 默认10

    Returns:
        包含搜索结果的字符串

tools.name: get_common_coins_prices
tools.description:
获取常见虚拟币的价格信息

    Returns:
        包含常见虚拟币价格的字符串

tools.name: get_coin_info
tools.description:
获取虚拟币的合约市场信息 (Coinglass API)

    Args:
        symbol: 币种符号，例如BTC、ETH

    Returns:
        包含币种在合约市场的详细信息

tools.name: get_kline_data
tools.description:
获取虚拟币合约的K线数据 (Coinglass API)

    Args:
        symbol: 币种符号，例如BTC、ETH
        granularity: K线粒度，默认1h (可选: 1m, 3m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 4h, 6h, 12h, 24h, 1d, 1w等)
        lookback_count: 需要获取的K线数量，默认100条

    Returns:
        包含K线数据的格式化信息

tools.name: get_position_info
tools.description:
获取虚拟币合约的持仓信息 (Coinglass API)

    Args:
        symbol: 币种符号，例如BTC、ETH
        granularity: K线粒度，默认1h (可选: 1m, 3m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 4h, 6h, 12h, 24h, 1d, 1w等)
        lookback_count: 需要获取的K线数量，默认100条

    Returns:
        包含持仓信息的格式化数据

tools.name: get_trade_volume
tools.description:
获取虚拟币合约的成交量信息 (Coinglass API)

    Args:
        symbol: 币种符号，例如BTC、ETH
        granularity: K线粒度，默认1h (可选: 1m, 3m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 4h, 6h, 12h, 24h, 1d, 1w等)
        lookback_count: 需要获取的K线数量，默认100条

    Returns:
        包含成交量信息的格式化数据

tools.name: get_trade_amount
tools.description:
获取虚拟币的成交额信息 (Coinglass API)

    Args:
        symbol: 币种符号，例如BTC、ETH
        granularity: K线粒度，默认1h (可选: 1m, 3m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 4h, 6h, 12h, 24h, 1d, 1w等)
        lookback_count: 需要获取的K线数量，默认100条

    Returns:
        包含成交额信息的格式化数据

tools.name: get_exchange_position
tools.description:
获取虚拟币在各交易所的持仓分布 (Coinglass API)

    Args:
        symbol: 币种符号，例如BTC、ETH

    Returns:
        包含各交易所持仓分布的格式化信息

server_info_crawled.name: 虚拟币价格查询服务
server_info_crawled.author: @telegramtool/crypto_mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: 查询最新的虚拟币价格和市场数据，帮助用户获取实时的加密货币信息。无缝集成到支持MCP的AI助手中，提供多种查询和分析功能。

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@telegramtool/crypto_mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
